trans-unit.source: Represents a command for the conceptual layer.
No content here will be updated; please do not add material here.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.EntityClient.EntityCommand"></xref> class using the specified values.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.EntityClient.EntityCommand"></xref> class with the specified statement.
The text of the command.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.EntityClient.EntityCommand"></xref> class with the specified statement and connection.
The text of the command.
A connection to the data source.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.EntityClient.EntityCommand"></xref> class with the specified statement, connection and transaction.
The text of the command.
A connection to the data source.
The transaction in which the command executes.
Cancels the execution of an <xref href="System.Data.EntityClient.EntityCommand"></xref>.
Gets or sets an Entity SQL statement that specifies a command or stored procedure to execute.
The Entity SQL statement that specifies a command or stored procedure to execute.
Gets or sets the amount of time to wait before timing out.
The time in seconds to wait for the command to execute.
Gets or sets the command tree to execute; only one of the command tree or the command text can be set, not both.
The command tree to execute.
Gets or sets a value that indicates how the <xref href="System.Data.EntityClient.EntityCommand.CommandText"></xref> property is to be interpreted.
One of the <xref href="System.Data.CommandType"></xref> enumeration values.
Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection"></xref> used by the <xref href="System.Data.EntityClient.EntityCommand"></xref>.
The connection used by the entity command.
Creates a new instance of an <xref href="System.Data.EntityClient.EntityParameter"></xref> object.
A new instance of an <xref href="System.Data.EntityClient.EntityParameter"></xref> object.
Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the command object should be visible in a Windows Form Designer control.
`true` if the command object should be visible in a Windows Form Designer control; otherwise, `false`.
Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the query plan caching is enabled.
`true` if the query plan caching is enabled; otherwise, `false`.
Executes the current command.
The number of rows affected.
Executes the command and returns a data reader.
The <xref href="System.Data.EntityClient.EntityDataReader"></xref> that contains the results.

Compiles the <xref href="System.Data.EntityClient.EntityCommand.CommandText"></xref> into a command tree and passes it to the underlying store provider for execution, then builds an <xref href="System.Data.EntityClient.EntityDataReader"></xref> out of the produced result set using the specified <xref href="System.Data.CommandBehavior"></xref>.
One of the <xref href="System.Data.CommandBehavior"></xref> values.
The <xref href="System.Data.EntityClient.EntityDataReader"></xref> that contains the results.
Executes the command, and returns the first column of the first row in the result set.
Additional columns or rows are ignored.
The first column of the first row in the result set, or a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic) if the result set is empty.
Gets the parameters of the Entity SQL statement or stored procedure.
The parameters of the Entity SQL statement or stored procedure.
Compiles the entity-level command and creates a prepared version of the command.
Compiles the entity-level command and returns the store command text.
The store command text.
Gets or sets the transaction within which the <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand"></xref> executes.
The transaction within which the <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand"></xref> executes.
Gets or sets how command results are applied to rows being updated.
One of the <xref href="System.Data.UpdateRowSource"></xref> values.
